Name: Jehoram (a.k.a. Joram in 1 Ch. 3:11), King of Judah
Uzziah (a.k.a. Ahaziah in 1 Ch. 3:11), King of Judah
Hezekiah, King of Judah
Documentation: 2 Kings 16:20, 2 Kings 18:1-2 (25years&29years), 1 Chronicles 3:13, 2 Chronicles 28:27, 2 Chronicles 29:1 (25years&29years), Matthew 1:9

Name: Jeconiah (a.k.a. Jehoiachin), King of Judah
Age Before Becoming King: Either 8 or 18. He became king in 597BC.
Documentation: 2 Kings 24:6, 2 Kings 24:8 (18yearsold, 3monthreign), 2 Kings 24:12 (Nebuchadnezzar II's 8th year), 1 Chronicles 3:15-16, 2 Chronicles 36:9 (8yearsold, 3month+10dayreign), Matthew 1:11
